title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You cant help but reveal how much a friendship means to you today. In fact, you might not realize the true value of a connection until either one of you faces hardship. Honoring your promises and showing up for a relatively new acquaintance displays your own mettle to them. But youre also a loyal pal if you know your limits and kindly say when you cant do more. Honesty and clarity are two virtues that keep old and new friends among the real treasures of life. Respect is one of the sweetest expressions of love. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
